title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Innovating Strategic Marketing Education Through VR-Based Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design the entire process of real-world marketing campaign planning and execution through VR simulations.
Learners improve strategic decision-making skills incorporating data analysis results through team-based collaboration.
By the course's conclusion, learners can write and present comprehensive marketing strategy reports based on real corporate case studies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
